DataElement.preferredName: Tooth Crack Diagnosis Yes No Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A yes/no indicator related to break or fissure in tooth (an organ, the organ parts of which primarily consist of dentine and dental enamel) being recognized.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: is an organ, the organ parts of which primarily consist of dentine and dental enamel; together with other teeth it constitutes a subdivision of the facial skeleton. Example(s): incisor, molar._A break or fissure in a structure._The investigation, analysis and recognition of the presence and nature of disease, condition, or injury from expressed signs and symptoms; also, the scientific determination of any kind; the concise results of such an investigation.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: is an organ, the organ parts of which primarily consist of dentine and dental enamel; together with other teeth it constitutes a subdivision of the facial skeleton. Example(s): incisor, molar.

Concepts.definition: The hard bonelike structures in the jaws of vertebrates; primarily used for eating.
